div.p: >>> THANKS FOR STAYING WITH US, I’M BILL O’REILLY IN THE

SAID IS THAT WHEN WE INVADE A COUNTRY IT’S TO FREE

>> LET ME GIVE YOU ONE EXAMPLE.

THAT JUST STEAMS ME. IT’S INSULT TO THE MILITARY
